duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure thorough and competent management of project schedule, budget, resource allocation, and documentation during the complete lifecycle of the build.
Maintain timely and effective communication with team, field, client, owner’s rep, design partner, etc.
Participate in project estimating and prepare pre-construction control estimates and schedules with the superintendent.
Track, review, and report on project financials and conduct value engineering as needed with cost analysis and recommendations.
Develop project schedules and review with appropriate in-house team, co-own the active build project schedule, and co-own the active build project schedule and all elements with the superintendent.
Identify, qualify, and manage subcontractors, managing materials-related activities, project documentation, and assuring project closeout.
Conduct post-construction project occupancy review and act as project liaison to Service Department as needed.
Participate in company growth, community engagement, and milestone cultivation in-keeping with company strategic objectives.
Review shop drawings for windows, cabinets, and other building elements as needed.
Assure project closeout including warranties, materials, finish schedules, etc.

education_certification.credential: Construction Management degree or other relevant education plus experience
